attributes.action: Ban ?Absolute Radio 60's from going on air
attributes.additional_details: Ban Absolute Radio 60's from going on air as they say they will never play Sir Cliff Richard's songs.  Cliff was the original Rock and Roll singer in this country and has sold far more records than the Beatles etc., and in every decade.  He has proved himself to be one of the most successful and popular singers we have today.  Absolute Radio 60's you haven't got a clue!
